sentences.english: After the wine lead three ten-day, Zhang Yunai drunk again.
sentences.chinese: 酒过三旬之后，张云爱又喝醉了。

sentences.english: The captain was drunk in his cabin.
sentences.chinese: 船长在他的船舱里喝醉了。

sentences.english: Drunken people often have slurred speech.
sentences.chinese: 喝醉酒的人说话时经常含糊不清。

sentences.english: The drunken man lurched along toward me.
sentences.chinese: 一个喝醉酒的人沿街踉跄而行。

sentences.english: When he does appear, he is almost always in a drunken stupor .
sentences.chinese: 当他看来，他几乎一直是在喝醉酒的木僵。

sentences.english: Drunken youths hang around outside looking for trouble.
sentences.chinese: 喝醉的年轻人在街头游荡，酗酒滋事。

sentences.english: GuoZhu wake up, the measure I got drunk hu nonsense words.
sentences.chinese: 国柱醒来，估量本人喝醉后胡胡说话。

sentences.english: I look after mum when she drinks and put her to bed.
sentences.chinese: 当她喝醉的时候我要照顾她，把她放到床上。

sentences.english: He became abusive when he was drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他喝醉时就满口脏话骂人了。

sentences.english: He was wiped out yesterday and doesn't wake up till now.
sentences.chinese: 他昨晚喝醉了，直到现在还没醒。

sentences.english: Mum: Why did some guys like to drive so fast when they are drunken?
sentences.chinese: 为什么有些家伙就是喜欢喝醉酒又开得很快呢？

sentences.english: The rest of us might as well be driving drunk.
sentences.chinese: 我们其余的人还不如驾驶喝醉了。

sentences.english: After all the guests had gone, the drunk master leaned against the tree and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 当宾客散去后，喝醉了的男主人斜靠在槐树下睡着了。

sentences.english: When he came home drunk, his wife reproached him with a loud angry voice.
sentences.chinese: 当他喝醉了回家时，他太太以高而愤怒的声音责备他。

definition: dead drunk/as drunk as a lord
to get drunk and act crazy/roaring drunk
lit. as drunk as mud/completely drunk
variant of 醉醺醺[zui4 xun1 xun1]
fragment/piece/(of a film) to break in the middle of viewing
after drinking/under the influence of alcohol
after wine, spit out the truth/in vino veritas
to fuddle/to befuddle/to inebriate/to get someone drunk
to force sb to drink alcohol
